titles.title: Expressing support for the Nation's law enforcement officers.
Expressing support for the Nation's law enforcement officers.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Crime, Terrorism, Homeland Security, and Investigations.

committee.subcommittee: Crime, Terrorism, Homeland Security, and Investigations
committee.name: House Judiciary

bill.summary:
Celebrates the dedication of and contributions made by law enforcement officers every day.
Encourages support for such officers nationwide.
